title: Man in Love
writer: Chih-Chung Chien, Lyra Fu, Kab-yeol Yu
short_cast: Roy Chiu, Hsu Wei-ning, Tsai Chen-nan, Chung Hsin-ling, Lan Wei-hua, Peace Yang, Huang Lu Tz-yin
cast: Roy Chiu, Hsu Wei-ning, Tsai Chen-nan, Chung Hsin-ling, Lan Wei-hua, Peace Yang, Huang Lu Tz-yin
genre: Taiwanese, Chinese Movies, Dramas, Romantic Movies
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 16 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 16
desc: When he meets a debt-ridden woman who's caring for her ailing father, a debt collector with a heart of gold sets out to win her love.
